p: This is a classification of the severity of DAI with three levels: in mild DAI, coma lasts 6–24 h. In moderate DAI, coma lasts longer than 24 h but there is no abnormal posturing. In severe cases of DAI, the coma duration is longer than 24 h and signs of brain stem impairment (decortication or decerebration) can also be found [ 44].
